response.overview: The highlight of the event, "NTT Docomo Presents Lemino BOXING PHOENIX BATTLE 147," is the 10-round OPBF Asia Pacific & WBO Asia Pacific Super Middleweight Championship match. The match will feature WBO-AP & OPBF Asia Pacific champion Yoon Deok-ho (Korea) and OPBF Asia Pacific champion Yoon Deok-ho (4th-ranked in the OPBF Asia Pacific division and 15th-ranked in the WBO-AP division).  Yuto Moriwaki (World Sports), the number one ranked fighter in Japan in the same weight class, will be competing. In addition, we will be exclusively streaming all 7 matches, including the 4th round of the Asian Heavyweight Challenge Cup Final!
response.title: PHOENIX BATTLE 147
